statements: UPDATE supplier_payment_histories SET payment_amount = 500.00, is_late_payment = false WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND payment_date = '2022-01-15';

UPDATE supplier_payment_histories SET payment_amount = 1500.50, is_late_payment = true, late_payment_flag_reason = 'Late payment due to unforeseen circumstances' WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND payment_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE supplier_payment_histories SET is_late_payment = false, late_payment_flag_reason = 'No late payment' WHERE payment_amount = 800.00 AND supplier_id = 201 AND payment_date = '2022-02-28';
